Summary: Hovered over buildings and vehicles and casted a bright orange colour, came down from escarpment than headed toward lake Ontario, More than one object.
divs: Sighting DetailsI understand that you can view the video capture at thespec.com. I am currently writing an exam for Mufon for a field investigator. I have been investigating UFO'S for over 35 years and also investigated Betty Hill in the late 70's. Please get ahold of me as soon as you can. Thank you. Joseph.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Stoney Creek
This sighting has never been favorited.
